features: Widely Compatibility : The dashboard cell phone holder is suitable for most kinds of cell phones or GPS devices which are between 6-12mm thick. Including iPhone 15/ 15 plus/ 15 pro/ 15 pro max/ iPhone 14/ 14 plus/ 14 pro/ 14 pro max/iPhone 13/ 13 mini/ 13 pro/ 13 pro max, Samsung Galaxy Note 8 /9/10 /10 pro/20 ultra, S20/S 8 /9 /10, S 20 plus/ 8 plus / 9 plus /10 plus, Garmin and so on. Please make sure that the thickness of your phone with protective case does not exceed 12 mm.

Stable & Slip free : Dependents on its soft silicone-textured bottom and sticky pads, it can protect phone against bumping, scratching or flying out whenever there is an emergency braking, sudden stop and sharp turn

Washable & Reusable : The bottom of the car phone holder is made from high-tech adhesives. Just rinse with water and dry it, it will be the same as the new one.This dashboard phone holder needs a flat area of approximately 5 inches by 5 inches on your car dashboard.

Use Tips : Peel off the sticky film on the bottom of the car phone holder and ensure your car dashboard surface being dry and clean (no dust) before laying the holder on. This car mount only support horizontal use.

Versatile Car Accessories: It's an excellent phone holder for car. With its ingenious storage compartment, you can keep your phone, data cables, keys, and spare change neatly arranged and easily accessible whenever you're on the go. Experience a new level of driving convenience with the travel essentials

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Provides Rigid Stability Ultra Stable Worry-less driving experience with the easy and efficient design. Reliable Gadget Ultra Sturdy All soft but tough silicone to safeguard your phone. Next page 1 Ultra Stable 2 Ultra Sturdy

Will this work with a iPhone 15 Pro Max with a case and pop socket on it? The cell phone holder is suitable for all cell phone devices which are between 0.23-0.47inch thickness.If you need more room, you can try to move the detachable back cushion, and then it can make the slot bigger and more angled how it needed to be. How much space does it need? Does it stick to the surface of car? It needs a flat smooth surface (5 x 5.1 inches) for installation. Applies to the most majority of dashboards, except some slightly texture surface or inclined, curve, irregular shapes. Can I easy to move and wash it if it gets dirty? This car mount is washable and reusable. You can peel off the holder from the bottom layer of the base. If the car mount is dirty or it cannot stick well, you can wash the bottom and it will be sticky again. Does the sticky tape leave residue when removed? The bottom adhesive of the dashboard car phone holder is not a permanent tape. It can be easily relocated without any marks if needed. How should I install the car phone holder? 1.Wipe up the dashboard 2.Peel off the protective film 3.Stick & compact the car phone holder 4.Fix/ Take off the phone with one hand

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for car or RV
reviews.reviewText: This one is a keeper!!! Love the size and look of this phone holder. I've tried so many different styles (expensive and cheap) just to throw them away. This one actually stays where you put it. Can handle many different sized phone covers. Sturdy enough to cushion the car's movements and keep the screen steady (landscape view only). Super simple to install and no moving parts. Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This product is so cute
reviews.reviewText: Not only is this product cute...... You can reposition it or move it and it doesn't leave anything sticky on your dash. Just wash of the back if you need to and stick it again. It doesn't feel sticky to the touch either. It's been on my dash since I got it. I don't have to take my phone out of case. It fits right in there. If you have armorall on your dash clean it off before you press it on to your dash. So far it's been durable and I love it. I probably misspelled armorall. LOL

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It stays in place. No adhesives, which is wonderful because you can take it when and if you have to get another vehicle. It can be moved to different spots. Very durable. Can charge phone while it sits in the cradle. It does not move while driving. It fits great even with a pop socket.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have purchased so many phone holders for rental cars. This is the first one that worked as it’s supposed to. No slipping, no falling off the dash. Great purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for small sedans
reviews.reviewText: I was struggling to find a phone holder I could use for my car, it’s a compact. So even if I have the air control turned all the way off, there will still be some air coming through the vents. I think they set it up that way intentionally for ventilation and safety. But for me what it means is I can set it all the way on defrost and there will still be air coming through the passenger cab vents. So I can’t use a vent clip for my phone in winter or the phone will overheat and shut off. I’ve tried the window suction cups, but they eventually fall down, which is unsafe while you’re driving. I tried the cup holder kind, but it holds the phone at an awkward angle if you’re using it for navigation. I’d rather have it somewhere I can see it without turning. This holder solves all those problems. I did find that the sun on the window can cause the phone to overheat in summer, but then I switched the AC from passenger cab/feet to defrost/feet, and it actually worked and kept the cab at a comfortable temperature and also kept the phone from overheating again.The sticky pad has loosened up a couple times, but I pushed it back down and it re-adhered without a problem. I feel like it has the right level of adhesion, so it’s not going to slide around, but you can get it off if you want to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small and secure
reviews.reviewText: holds the phone securely, does't block any of the screen and takes up only a small portion of your dash. Excellent product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Doesn’t fall off! Heat or cold
reviews.reviewText: Been looking for a phone holder for my car for awhile. This one doesn’t fall of ever! It’s so quick to mount my phone by simply sliding it in place. Yes, the phone may move forward a bit sometimes but I just push it back quickly. It’s never fallen off while driving. I love having the 2 cable holders on for my Aux Cord, and the other for my charging cable. I don’t mind my phone being held sideways, but if you must have it straight up this may not be for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Price is good and it works good
reviews.reviewText: This is great to have. Makers just could of done better where the plug goes on our gps the gps doesn’t sit fully correctly on it as it does in the picture. It does however still stay in place other than that no other issues. I would buy again if needed.
El material es resistente, es útil casi para cualquier tipo de celular, buena compra.

reviews.reviewTitle: Stays in place! Holds the phone perfectly!
reviews.reviewText: Very happy with this holder. Works perfectly. Instal it exactly where you want it as it’s stationary. Exactly what I was looking for!

Aussitôt acheté, aussitôt installé ; Après avoir essayé toutes sortes de supports ( magnétiques, à ventouse ou à pince ) qui ne tenaient pas, j'ai enfin trouvé le support parfait : Facile à installer, maintenant bien le téléphone, adhérant bien au tableau de bord, ce support présente en plus l'avantage de laisser libres les touches d'allumage et de volume son du portable et celui de ne pas gêner la vision du conducteur. Personnellement, je le trouve esthétique et peu encombrant. Une petite suggestion pour qu'il atteigne la perfection : Pouvoir maintenir le téléphone à la verticale et imaginer un système de rotation. Félicitations aux concepteurs pour cette idée géniale !

The product is really overpriced for what it is. A silicon phone holder more likely for a stationary desk as it DOES NOT STICK AT ALL. The adhesive is weaker than cello tape and the product fails its purpose as a dashboard mobile holder. Sadly I got the time to open the package and try too late and am not planning to buy double sided tape to make it work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Quality and performance is very good... worth for the monet given
